name: Dory-ALog
description: Our Dory-ALog is a high-protein, high-sodium culinary delight that's been healthified for those who love to indulge in healthy recipes. Perfect for anyone looking to enrich their diet with nutritious, yet incredibly flavorful dishes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the 율무 (Job's Tears) under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the 율무 (Job's Tears) according to package instructions until tender, about 20 minutes, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the baby corn spears and chop the pechay.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the whole fruit into wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Season the cream dory fillet with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a non-stick skillet, cook the cream dory fillet over medium heat until golden brown and cooked through, about 4 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pan, lightly sauté the baby corn spears and chopped pechay for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked 율무 (Job's Tears) with the sautéed vegetables. Add the all-purpose pesto and mix until the ingredients are well coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the pesto mix topped with the cooked cream dory fillet and garnish with the fruit wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
